name: Myosotis (Egg)
description:
⚠️Content warning⚠️ This game contains the following material:

-Swearing

-Emotional Abuse

-Verbal Abuse

-Mention of self-harm

-Blood

-Implication(s) of murder

-Dealing with trauma associated with aforementioned topics.

___

Myosotis, also known as "Forget-Me-Nots". 

This game is a form of "vent art" for me. I was in a very dark emotional place when I was first developing it. I needed an outlet to channel these thoughts and feelings, and here's what I've come up with...

The contents of this game can be quite the heavy topic for a lot of people. Do not put yourself in harms' way if you think these topics will be triggering for you.

Please: If you, or anyone you know is suffering from thoughts of self-harm or suicide, please, call your local Suicide Prevention Hotline.
